job_tasks.phrase: passie voor innovatie binnen e-commerce en digitale marketing
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business domain (e-commerce and digital marketing) and a focus on innovation within that context.

job_tasks.phrase: data-analyse en AI-oplossingen verlegt om waardevolle inzichten te genereren en marketingactiviteiten te optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the goal of using data analysis and AI to generate insights and optimize marketing activities, directly linking technical work to business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: analyseren van marketingdata om strategische beslissingen te ondersteunen
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility of using data analysis to support strategic business decisions.

job_tasks.phrase: adviseer je klanten door complexe technologieën te vertalen naar praktische en strategische oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need to translate technical solutions into business value and strategic advice for clients.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je geavanceerde AI- en datasystemen
job_tasks.justification: This broadly covers the development and implementation of AI systems, which inherently involves modeling aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer je geavanceerde AI- en datasystemen
job_tasks.justification: The verbs 'ontwerp', 'ontwikkel', and 'implementeer' along with 'systemen' directly relate to the software development lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: verlegt de grenzen van data-analyse en AI-oplossingen
analyseren van marketingdata om strategische beslissingen te ondersteunen
vertalen naar praktische en strategische oplossingen

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on applying AI and data analysis within marketing and e-commerce contexts, emphasizing business insights and strategic decision-making. It lacks specific details on advanced AI modeling techniques or the development of generative AI systems, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.
